questions: Does the image depict an open ancient book with yellowed pages? Answer with yes or no.
Are the pages of the book tattered at the edges? Answer with yes or no.
Is the book resting on a wooden table? Answer with yes or no.
Is there densely packed ancient text on the left page? Answer with yes or no.
Does the right page show a miniature scene with a courtyard and a blooming cherry blossom tree? Answer with yes or no.
Are there cherry blossom petals falling in the scene depicted on the right page? Answer with yes or no.
Is there a woman in a pink Hanfu standing on the grass in the miniature scene? Answer with yes or no.
Is the woman holding a broom and sweeping the fallen petals? Answer with yes or no.
Does the courtyard background include a traditional Chinese building with red pillars and blue tiles? Answer with yes or no.
Is the courtyard surrounded by small trees and rock decorations? Answer with yes or no.
Is there a faint halo around the pages enhancing the three-dimensional effect? Answer with yes or no.
Are there cherry blossom petals scattered on the table in front of the book? Answer with yes or no.
Is the background soft beige, creating an atmosphere full of ancient poetic charm and historical feel? Answer with yes or no.
Are the details exquisite and the colors soft, showcasing the weathered feel of the ancient book and the tranquil beauty of the courtyard? Answer with yes or no.
model_output:
yes The image shows an open book with pages that have a yellowed appearance.
yes The edges of the book pages appear to be rough and uneven, suggesting they are tattered.
yes The book is placed on what looks like a wooden surface resembling a table.
yes The left page contains a large amount of text filling the page, indicating densely packed content.
yes The right page features a detailed miniature scene including a courtyard with a prominent cherry blossom tree.
yes The scene captures cherry blossoms with some petals visibly falling from the tree.
yes A figure dressed in what appears to be a pink Hanfu is visible in the grassy area.
no The figure does not seem to be holding a broom or engaging in sweeping.
yes In the background, there is a structure with features resembling traditional Chinese architecture, including red pillars and blue tiles.
yes The courtyard area includes decorative small trees and rocks around the central scene.
yes There is a glowing aura around the book pages which contributes to a three-dimensional effect.
yes Cherry blossom petals are scattered on the wooden surface beneath the book.
yes The background has a soft beige tone that enhances the ancient and poetic feeling.
yes The overall details are finely rendered with soft colors, portraying the aged look of the book and the serene beauty of the scene.
